title: Circle of the Land
content:
6ColdImpel a storm of hail and ice to crash from the sky, covering the ground and striking all objects and creatures within range.

5~40 Damage5d8Fire

Create a blazing wall of fire, burning anyone who dares stand too close. 18m DEX Save Concentration

If the spell attack hits, target is afflicted with a disease to choose from 6 proposed.

Blinding Sickness: Pain grips the creature's mind, and its eyes turn milky white. The creature has disadvantage on Wisdom checks and Wisdom saving throws and
